getKeywordId.brief: Retrieve the keyword ID from its device and keyword friendly names

keywordName.brief: Keyword name to search for ID

getKeywordId.throw: Error if several (some have to be renamed) or none keyword ID found

getRecipientId.brief: Retrieve the recipient ID from its first and last names

readKeyword.brief: Read the last known state of the keyword

keywordId.brief: The keyword ID we are interesting in

readKeyword.return: The last known keyword state (empty if no known state)

waitForAcquisition.brief: Wait for a new acquisition on a keyword

timeout.brief: Timeout to wait. Format is "hh:mm:ss.xxx". No timeout if empty (default).

waitForAcquisition.return: The keyword new state (empty if timeout)

waitForAcquisitions.brief: Wait for a new acquisition on a keyword list

keywordIdList.brief: The keyword IDs list to watch

timeout.brief: Timeout to wait. Format is "hh:mm:ss.xxx". No timeout if empty (default).

waitForAcquisitions.return: Returned value is a pair of the keyword Id who changed, and its new value. The keyword Id is kTimeout if timeout.
waitForAcquisitions.throw: Error if at least one keyword was not found

keywordId.brief: The keyword ID to change state

writeKeyword.details: Do nothing if keyword is not found or not writable

keywordId.brief: The keyword ID to use to send notification

sendNotification.details: Do nothing if keyword or recipient is not found or not writable
sendNotification.throw: Error if keyword or recipient not found

getInfo.return: Information as string (empty string if not found)
details: Supported value (don't forget to prefix by 'yApi.') :
- kSunrise : get current day sunrise time (format is 'HH:MM')
- kSunset : get current day sunset time (format is 'HH:MM')
- kLatitude : get latitude : returns latitude configured by user (or approximative latitude if not configured)
- kLongitude : get longitude : returns latitude configured by user (or approximative longitude if not configured)
- kAltitude : get altitude : returns latitude configured by user (or approximative altitude if not configured)
- kYadomsServerOS : get yadoms server OS : returns a string containing the OS name where Yadoms is running
- kYadomsServerVersion : get yadoms application version : returns a string containing the Yadoms application version

ruleEnable.brief: Can be used to prevent a rule for auto-restart

enable.brief: True to active auto-restart, False to disable the rule (after the current execution is complete)

ruleEnable.details: By default, a rule auto-restart at its end
